title: Clarity regarding special topics in 3rd semester(CSE) and cie l1
content:
If any seniors could pls let me know as to what exactly the special topics that were offered for their  batch(preferably cse) were  and how was the grading and the length of those.

Furthermore are there any special topics with high demand requiring screening tests or any particular ones you would recommended to take?

Also how is the cie l1 special topic ? Is it good enough to take instead of other topics and does it help in the future(placements or otherwise)?

Thanks in advance.

comments.body:
Im almost entering my fifth semester and I'm an ece student so I won't comment on the special topics part, we didn't have any in sem 3 either.

Cie is one thing I'd recommend doing, i did it in sem 4 and it really does help if your goal is to be an entrepreneur at some point, it's also very fun otherwise. I don't really know if it does help with placements but I'm sure it'd be of some help to finish L1.
Thanks for the reply.Did u follow it up with L2?
